content.introduction: Welcome to our service. Please read the following terms and conditions carefully before using this service.
content.acceptanceContent: By accessing and using this service, you agree to be bound by this User Agreement. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use this service.
content.serviceDescriptionContent: This service is an AI content creation platform that helps users generate and manage multimedia content.
content.userResponsibilitiesContent: Users should ensure that their use of this service complies with local laws and regulations and shall not be used for illegal purposes.
content.privacyContent: We value your privacy. For detailed information, please refer to our Privacy Policy.
content.terminationContent: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend the service at any time.
content.contactContent: If you have any questions, please contact us via email: support@example.com

content.introduction: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
content.informationCollectionContent: We collect information you voluntarily provide and information automatically collected when you use our services.
content.informationUseContent: We use the collected information to provide, maintain, and improve our services.
content.informationSharingContent: We do not sell, trade, or transfer your personal information to third parties.
content.dataSecurityContent: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information.
content.userRightsContent: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information.
content.contactContent: For privacy-related questions, please contact us: privacy@example.com

dataDeletion.title: Request Data Deletion
dataDeletion.subtitle: If you wish to delete your personal data, please follow these steps
dataDeletion.prelaunchContent: We are currently in pre-launch phase. For data deletion, please contact our support team directly.
steps: Log into your account and go to the settings page
Confirm the deletion operation and wait for processing
dataDeletion.contactEmail: For assistance, please send an email to: datadeletion@example.com
dataDeletion.processingTimeContent: Data deletion requests are typically processed within 7-14 business days.
dataDeletion.importantNoteContent: Data cannot be recovered after deletion. Please proceed with caution. Some data required by law may not be deletable.
